column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Came here about two weeks ago. Loved everything about the place. The ambiance stands out in particular
column2: and the al fresco dining was inviting and pleasant for the summer. The sangrias are a must order
column3: and even considering Ba-Ba-Reeba as a tapas restaurant everything we ordered was of a medium plate size and very reasonably priced. We had the wood roasted peppers
column5: the sweet potato bravas with pomegranate alioli
column6: the goat cheese in tomato sauce
column9: and a few other things. I would recommend any of these.
